scripts.dev: pnpm --filter @i2-labs/design-overlay build && pnpm --filter @i2-labs/sandbox build && pnpm --filter demo dev
scripts.dev:watch: pnpm --filter @i2-labs/design-overlay build && pnpm --filter @i2-labs/sandbox build && concurrently -n overlay,sandbox,demo "pnpm --filter @i2-labs/design-overlay build:watch" "pnpm --filter @i2-labs/sandbox build:watch" "pnpm --filter demo dev"
